thread.title: The Dow is in danger of doing something it hasn’t since 1978
thread.title_full: The Dow is in danger of doing something it hasn’t since 1978

author: Matt Egan, CNN
title: The Dow is in danger of doing something it hasn’t since 1978
text: By By Matt Egan, CNN, 14 minutes agoComments YOU MAY ALSO LIKE · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN Trump’s tariffs could usher in a worst-case economic scenario not seen since the 1970s Jamie Dimon, head of America’s largest bank, JPMorgan Chase — and commonly referred to as the ‘president of Wall Street’ — spent much of this past year warning that there’s an elevated risk that the US experiences 1970s-esque stagflation, which is when economic growth stagnates while inflation heats up. · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN · Followuser · 11.1K followers Kristen Brady Elon Musk Says Bill Gates Will Face Bankruptcy If Tesla’s Stocks Surge Elon Musk, Tesla Inc. CEO, said on X that Bill Gates, co-founder of Microsoft Corp. might go bankrupt if Tesla becomes ‘the most valuable company,’ which escalated their long-term dispute over Bill Gates’ short position in the EV manufacturer. · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN CNN visits small town where shocking mass rape allegedly occurred over 10 years In a case that’s horrified France and shocked the world, 49 men are accused of raping Gisele Pelicot after her husband, Dominique Pelicot, allegedly drugged her repeatedly and left her unconscious. The abuse took place over nearly 10 years. CNN has gained exclusive access to a police report containing thousands of messages exchanged by Pelicot and the accused in chatrooms, on Skype and over text, revealing how the alleged crimes could have happened. While the website that Pelicot used to allegedly organize the abuse has been shut down, a CNN investigation has uncovered new forums where rape and sexual abuse are still actively discussed. There are fears that similar crimes could still be happening in plain sight. · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN Experts explain phenomenon of adults who leave their lives behind At face value, Ryan Borgwardt, Hannah Kobayashi and Luigi Mangione lead distinct lives and come from disparate backgrounds. Yet, they all made the same unexpected decision: disappear from their jobs, routines, friends and family. [Madison ·](/madison-wi)3h · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN US embassy in Vanuatu suffers ‘considerable damage’ as powerful quake strikes Pacific nation A powerful 7.3 earthquake hit Vanuatu on Tuesday, damaging multiple buildings, including a complex in the capital Port Vila that hosts the diplomatic missions of Western nations including the United States. · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN Bob Fernandez, 100-year-old Pearl Harbor survivor, dies peacefully at home 83 years after bombing Bob Fernandez, a 100-year-old survivor of the Japanese bombing of Pearl Harbor, died shortly after deteriorating health prompted him to skip a trip to Hawaii to attend last week’s remembrance ceremony marking the 83rd anniversary of the attack. This moment marks a symbolic and historic shift for the state as it grapples with a new era of federal leadership. Every morning, she checks to see whether he’s raised the blinds in his dining room window. If not, she’ll call Hammen or let herself into his house to see what’s going on. Here’s what they had to say The American public is closely divided on the outlook for Donald Trump’s second term, a new CNN poll conducted by SSRS finds, with 52% of adults expressing positive feelings, and 48% responding negatively. · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN Former FBI informant pleads guilty to lying about phony bribery scheme involving the Bidens A former FBI informant pleaded guilty Monday to lying about a phony bribery scheme involving Joe Biden and his son Hunter that became central to congressional Republicans’ impeachment inquiry into the president. California Department of Insurance Chief Administrative Law Judge (CALJ) Kristin I. Rosi's ruling focuses on how rate increases were approved without proper judicial oversight, as required by Proposition 103. We are now on Day 1016 of a war that has yet to see an end. Although there's no clear answer yet - Trump has announced plans to come to an agreement between the parties soon. · Followverified publisher · 2.8M followers CNN · Followuser · 10.4K followers Bucks County Beacon US House Passes Dangerous Bill That Could Punish Nonprofits Treasury Department Decides Are ‘Terrorist’ Written by Emily Schwartz Greco , with Beth Gazley , Indiana University. The U.S. House of Representatives has passed a bill that would empower the Treasury Department to eliminate the tax-exempt status of any nonprofit it deems to be supporting terrorism. The Stop Terror-Financing and Tax Penalties on American Hostages Act was approved in a 219-184 vote , with all but one Republican backing it and only 15 Democrats voting for it, on Nov. 21, 2024. · Followuser · 9.3K followers Jacksonville Today Local first responder takes Christmas to Colombian orphans Max Morel-Sepulveda has dared to venture into the barrios of Colombia in recent years to help the needy with food, clothing and more. A uniformed first responder for the city of Jacksonville for a decade, he made these trips after founding Reaching the Unreached , a nonprofit agency that specifically helps children and families in Latin America.
